name: Data Fiduciary
description: Entity determining purposes and means of processing personal data

name: Significant Data Fiduciary
description: Large-scale data processors with enhanced obligations

name: Data Processor
description: Entity processing personal data on behalf of fiduciary

name: Data Principal
description: Individual to whom personal data relates

name: Consent Manager
description: Facilitates collection and management of consent

name: Data Protection Officer
description: Appointed by SDFs for compliance oversight

name: Data Protection Authority
description: Regulatory and enforcement body under DPDPA
